title: Remove FieldType.getNumericType() from master
description: LegacyNumericType FieldType.getNumericType() is no longer used since SOLR-10011, and it was deprecated (replaced by NumberType getNumberType()). We can remove it from master (7.0)

comments.content: Same patch, updated to master and with CHANGES upgrade note
comments.author: Tomás Fernández Löbbe

comments.content:
Commit abec54bd5722bc818fe46e111cf652cd7671db86 in lucene-solr's branch refs/heads/master from Tomas Fernandez Lobbe
[ https://git-wip-us.apache.org/repos/asf?p=lucene-solr.git;h=abec54b ]

SOLR-10236: Remove FieldType.getNumericType() from master
